ghostPost.title: Using Cloudflare with Ghost
ghostPost.excerpt: Using Cloudflare with Ghost for self-hosted developers.
ghostPost.meta_title: Configuration for using Cloudflare with Ghost self-hosted - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: Information about using Cloudflare with Ghost for self-hosted developers.

primary_tag.name: Errors
primary_tag.description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!
primary_tag.meta_description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!

tags.name: Errors
tags.description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!
tags.meta_description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!

ghostPost.plaintext:
If you’ve added Cloudflare to your self-hosted Ghost publication and find that
Ghost Admin doesn’t load after updates you may run into some errors in the
JavaScript console:

TypeError: n.item is not a function  or Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected string

To resolve this add a page rule to turn off the features RocketLoader, mirage2
and autominify for the path /ghost*.
ghostPost.html:
If you’ve added Cloudflare to your self-hosted Ghost publication and find that Ghost Admin doesn’t load after updates you may run into some errors in the JavaScript console:

TypeError: n.item is not a function or Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected string

To resolve this add a page rule to turn off the features RocketLoader, mirage2 and autominify for the path /ghost*.
